63.eng-name: Merits of the Helpers in Madinah (Ansaar)

hadiths.text: Narrated Anas bin Malik:The Prophet (ﷺ) said, "The Ansar are my near companions to whom I confided my private secrets, People will go on increasing but the Ansar will go on decreasing; so accept the good of the good-doers amongst them and excuse the wrong-doers amongst them

chapter.ara-name: باب قَوْلُ النَّبِيِّ صلى الله عليه وسلم " اقْبَلُوا مِنْ مُحْسِنِهِمْ وَتَجَاوَزُوا عَنْ مُسِيئِهِمْ "
chapter.eng-name: “Accept the good of the good-doers amongst them, and excuse the wrong-doers.”
